Test running Hook with Call using timer.

<<< hook_after.json
{
  "LastRun": "2023-01-09T00:00:00Z",
  "NextRun": "2023-01-09T00:01:00Z",
  "Interval": 60000000000,
  "NumRunning": 0,
  "Logs": [
    {
      "HookID": "test_hook_timer",
      "Name": "test_hook_timer.1.success",
      "Status": "success",
      "Counter": 1,
      "Content": "T3V0cHV0IGZyb20gQ2FsbA=="
    }
  ],

  "Name": "Test hook timer",
  "Description": "",
  "Path": "/test-hook-timer",

  "Commands": null,

}
